system.description:
An item of supreme wizardly power, this staff may be used as a weapon in melee, and may evoke a dozen different magical effects.

  • Arcane magic: Usable by arcane spell casters only.

  • In melee: Treated as a staff with a +1 magic bonus to attack and damage rolls.

  • Striking: Expending one charge, inflicts [[/r 2d6]] damage on a successful hit.

  • Cone of cold: Conjures a cone of freezing energy, 60’ long and 30’ wide at the far end. Creatures caught in the cone suffer [[/r 8d6]] damage, with a successful save versus spells indicating half damage.

  • Paralysation: Conjures a cone of magical energy, 60’ long and 30’ wide at the far end. Creatures caught in the cone are paralysed for 6 turns (save versus spells to avoid).

  • Spells: Can cast: @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.EU9n7vjbVnS32jBo]{conjure elemental} (8 HD), @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.kpC4u6vrjJ1RnikN]{continual light}, @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.ZrYh8AabsTCnqRjb]{fire ball} ([[/r 8d6]] damage), @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.1YF6jV01OkoNViec]{invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.anWBslOOlZtV47ut]{lightning bolt} ([[/r 8d6]] damage), @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.yGIGg1GYsCQApO20]{pass-wall}, @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.g7CsvZa6bNbXiCAJ]{telekinesis} (up to 2,400 coins of weight), @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.xGExmmZW6E9yuXmI]{web}. 

  • Whirlwind: Conjures a whirlwind 70’ tall, 20’ wide at the top, and 10’ wide at the base. The whirlwind lasts for 3 rounds, and moves at 120’ (40’), as the wielder of the staff directs. All in its path suffer [[/r 2d6]] damage. Creatures with less than 2HD are swept aside (save versus death to avoid).

  • Sacrifice: The wielder may sacrifice the staff by breaking it in two. Doing so unleashes a 30’ radius fireball that inflicts 8 points of damage per remaining charge in the staff. The wielder of the staff also suffers this damage.
